scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified as Saint John the Baptist by his halo and attire, stands in a natural setting with stylized trees and foliage. He is barefoot and wears a simple tunic. He holds a lamb in his arms, which appears to be a sacrificial lamb, and a book. The lamb is a symbol of Christ, the "Lamb of God." The scene is framed by decorative borders.
scene_interpretation: Saint John the Baptist with the Lamb of God
